javadoc: Holds information read from a {@link FileSystemInfo} annotation.

methods.name: fromClass
methods.comment:
Instantiate a new FileSystemInfoRec from the information found in the
 FileSystemInfo annotation attached to the specified Class.

params.name: fsClazz
params.comment: class to query for file system info.

return.comment:
new FileSystemInfoRec, or null if the class doesn't have
 valid file system meta data.

methods.javadoc:
Filesystem 'type', ie. "file", or "zip", etc.
@return type string
methods.name: getType

methods.javadoc:
Filesystem description, ie. "XYZ Vendor Filesystem Type 1"
@return description string
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Filesystem description, ie. "XYZ Vendor Filesystem Type 1"

methods.javadoc:
Filesystem relative priority.

See {@link FileSystemInfo#priority()}. @return priority int
methods.name: getPriority

methods.javadoc:
The {@link Class} of the filesystem implementation.
@return {@link GFileSystem} derived class.
methods.name: getFSClass
methods.comment: The Class of the filesystem implementation.

methods.name: getFactory
methods.comment:
The GFileSystemFactory instance that will create new filesystem
 instances when needed.

name: FileSystemInfoRec
comment: Holds information read from a FileSystemInfo annotation.

fields.javadoc:
A static {@link Comparator} that will order {@link FileSystemInfoRec} by their
 {@link FileSystemInfoRec#getPriority() priority}, with the highest priority
 elements sorted to the beginning of the list.
fields.name: BY_PRIORITY
fields.comment:
A static Comparator that will order FileSystemInfoRec by their
 FileSystemInfoRec#getPriority(), with the highest priority
 elements sorted to the beginning of the list.
